channel.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
channel.description: Heya guys, I recently downloaded devine pk v5.0 and followed the small tutorial that was in a readme.txt file and was happy to find that i got my server up and running publicly in 6 minutes! :D I have added a password to the database on phpmyadmin and changed the config for the server access. I kno how to ban people, spawn items in their banks and much more. I have added a shopkeeper in that sells party hats, (all rares), rune sets, dragons / rune weapons and sharks. The problem that i have come across is being able to drop a item on the ground. When i attempt to do so, the item disappears from my inventory leaving nothing on the ground. I wouldnt have a clue where to start editing any coding, so if anyone could gimme a hand in solving this it would be greatly appreciated. Also the source im using is Demonik, thinking of changing to daemon purely because it is smoother and less buggier

item.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

I don’t know the part which prevents the item from appearing on the ground, I’ve never looked at it. But you can try looking in the DropEvent.java

Read full topic
item.source: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O

item.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
item.dc:creator: @imagplaya imagplaya
item.description:
@imagplaya wrote:

to spawn items use ::pickup (id) (#) to spawn npcs use ::npc (id) if u wanna turn on drops erase ur current drop.cfg and drop java file(right click edit it and delete everything in it) dl a new source and copy there drop.cfg and drop.java add it to urs make sure u use the same type of base for example if the 1 ur using now is allstar v2 u have to use allstarv1-allstar v2 don’t use any newew version than u have or ur compiler won’t recognize ur drop coding

Read full topic
item.source: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O

item.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

yeah, not really sure what is going on, does anyone kno the code that prevents items from being dropped from your inventory to the ground?

Read full topic

item.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

yes but there shouldn’t be any “(” “)”, just split it with " ". E.g. “::item 10 5000”

Read full topic

item.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“liquidazer, post:3, topic:253589”]i see,
do you know which bit of code is preventing people to drop?

Also im not sure if this is right but to spawn npcs you must type “::npc (Id) (amount)” right?
And for items its "::item (Id) (amount) because when i go to try spawn any of them absolutely nothing happens.
It is the same with the “teleport command”. If it is "::teleport (y, x) it aint working for me and i think its to do with
this codepreventing anything from droping on the ground.[/quote]What would teleporting have to do with item dropping…? Lol…

Read full topic

do you know which bit of code is preventing people to drop?

Also im not sure if this is right but to spawn npcs you must type “::npc (Id) (amount)” right?
And for items its "::item (Id) (amount) because when i go to try spawn any of them absolutely nothing happens.
It is the same with the “teleport command”. If it is "::teleport (y, x) it aint working for me and i think its to do with
this codepreventing anything from droping on the ground.

item.title: Server up n going ! Need coding help.. o.O
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

Well switching to RSCD would be a better choice, however theres 4(i think) things in it that make it unsecure.

The reason items don’t appear when you drop them is an attempt to prevent duping. I don’t think anyones just going to tell you how to make them drop, but you can just get your inv full then spawn the item(s) you want to drop and they’ll appear on the floor.

Read full topic
